Title: Episode Seven
Plot:
It's another bad week for Simon, as first he gets blamed for a fiasco involving teachers faces on nude bodies, then falls out with fellow English teacher Bob, who will be interviewing him for his promotion. He also witnesses a pupil going into labour and realises how inadequate his knowledge of the female body is.
Brian and Kurt are involved with a face off over Carole and Liz regarding access to Claire's office.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, nudity, drug use & offensive language
